website_summaries.verdict: The unlocked Priv brings BlackBerry's basic strengths—a physical keyboard and notifications—to Android in a big, heavy, pricey package, making it a niche buy.
pros: Excellent voice quality and battery life

customer_reviews.title: Phone was purchased and received January 20, 2018. ...
customer_reviews.text: Phone was purchased and received January 20, 2018. Worked as expected up until last week, March 9, 2018, when the screen went green and thereafter started to flicker. I tried all suggestions, including turning off the phone and restarting. Nothing has worked and now the screen is mostly blank and when it does come on its mostly green. A screen replacement, to start, has been suggested by my local repairer. I believe the supplier of the phone should send me a replacement screen
customer_reviews.author: Shopper IS

customer_reviews.title: I do not recommend buying.
customer_reviews.text: Product with failure in wifi service, I do not recommend buying.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Vera

customer_reviews.title: Love it!! Great android, awesome keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Awesome phone. Android works perfect. Keyboar is amazingly useful. Touchscreen is great. Huge memory. Great battery. Totally recommended!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jhoanna Rosales

customer_reviews.title: Its a good product overall
customer_reviews.text: Its a good product overall. I have noticed that when I receive a whatsapp audio, the volume really goes low and screen blacks out. It hangs sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: the card is easily read by 2 my old phones
customer_reviews.text: Insert micro sd card properly, but phone can not read, it says unrecognized, damaged, the card is easily read by 2 my old phones,Gheck in setting when I insert it and click mount it, then error code appears. Sophisticated!!!!
customer_reviews.author: kusmadijaya

customer_reviews.title: PRIVileged
customer_reviews.text: Even in 2018 this mobile excels. Particularly if you use the phone for work. BB's DTEK app make sure you are not allowing Android too much freedom with your data. Hub is the best message consolidation app out there. Now on Android, you can use Skype for Business, Excel, Word all that good stuff. The keyboard is good. Not as great as the BB Passport but still workable. Battery life is great: 2 days no charging on the weekend! Curved screen is a nice touch and all-in-all a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Five Foot Three Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: I have it one day and by now I love it! It is true that you have to ...
customer_reviews.text: It came on time; I have it one day and by now I love it! It is true that you have to get used to the physical keyb. after having a touch one, so I constantly forget to swipe it. I also have to learn the shortcuts and tricks, but by now - awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Silvia Grilec

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant but sometimes too hot (literally)
customer_reviews.text: An amazing smartphone with one major drawback: it's overheating like crazy. Despite low ambient temperatures I keep getting warnings during regular use that the phone is overheating and taking steps to cool itself. While on Skype or navigation, with no other apps open, the back gets really hot and the only way to really mitigate it is to open up the keyboard to let a bit of heat out. Apart from that it's everything and more than I wanted from it. The keyboard is brilliant and the performance overall is very good. I just hope it doesn't catch fire one day.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Boris Sevsek

customer_reviews.title: Can see how times are catching up with this one
customer_reviews.text: I like it a lot, though there are some basic performance issues and maybe coz the battery is 2 years old it will never give me a day unless I don't use it. Super comfortable to use even with one hand, the physical keyboard and trackpad make it a great phone all round and thanks for using android for this one!
customer_reviews.author: Óscar S.

customer_reviews.title: Great handset for business
customer_reviews.text: Very nice phone, quick and easy to write emails. Also very good voice recognition for email which is very nice also. Phone good and clear. Good business phone, as you can read adobe PDF and documents with ease on the move. Good quality camera for taking close up photos of widgets.
customer_reviews.author: R. Day

customer_reviews.title: Do not order - support from Blackberry no longer available
customer_reviews.text: OK so I've used B&B's since the first model. I love their 'sliders' the best. So when my Private screen lost power to one side, I decided to replace rather than repair. The new one ran hot and was glitchy from the start. The promised 1year support has been withdrawn. This phone is now obsolete. RIP. Amazing customer care from Amazon, as ever. What a relief.
customer_reviews.author: Tiny Tom

customer_reviews.title: The one all others must bow to...Awesome
customer_reviews.text: It Rocks.....ergonomic..best design...beautifully constructed...user friendly...no Google control freakery..a joy to use...all power to Google's elbow...LOVE it!
customer_reviews.author: Bunty

customer_reviews.title: Feed back
customer_reviews.text: Keeps sticking on pages and keeps reducing volume and therefore missing. I have normally had blackberries and like them but not this one so please send me returns form.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have had Blackberries for some time and like them - this phone has all the good features ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had Blackberries for some time and like them - this phone has all the good features of Blackberry along with Android. The hard keyboard is a good bonus through the screen keyboard is good. Excellent screen. I can thoroughly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Williams

customer_reviews.title: Arrived when it was supposed to and it's great to have a new phone that I was happy ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived when it was supposed to and it's great to have a new phone that I was happy with the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BlackBerry Priv replacement.
customer_reviews.text: Great price on an iconic device that operates on Android. Great service from the supplier and unit is new and un-used too.
customer_reviews.author: John P

customer_reviews.title: Blackberry Priv
customer_reviews.text: Blackberry phone arrived, brand new and works very well thank you Sent to wrong address originally which is reason for bad review below, better communication would help!!
customer_reviews.author: William G

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone. It arrived before 8th March and is very quick just really happy with the service I received
customer_reviews.author: Vicky Von - Hessler

customer_reviews.title: But after couple of weeks it is normal now and it is perfect for me after q10
customer_reviews.text: It was a bit too big at start. But after couple of weeks it is normal now and it is perfect for me after q10.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like this phone
customer_reviews.text: I like this phone, it's styling and looks, but it took a little while to get used to it. Good battery life. About 2days +.
customer_reviews.author: david hill

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: Had this for some time now and I can say hand on heart I love it. Best phone I've ever had.
customer_reviews.author: HB

customer_reviews.text: This has everything I want in a phone. Fantastic, quick operating system. Curved edges. BUTTONS! Top notch android phone with blackberry hub and buttons. I've had it a few months now and it is the best phone I've ever owned. It is quite big in the hand, being used to compact phones previously it took a bit of getting used to, but it really is easy to use and great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Trudy

customer_reviews.title: I wont recommend. This is Not sim free internationaly
customer_reviews.text: This product is awful i travel often abraod and i bought it because i needed to use it internationaly today I am traveling out of country and my international SIM is not working this phone. However it is working fine woth my unlocked Iphone 6. The worst thing is there is no way to contact the seller only u can leave reviews and waste ur money which doesnt fit wepl to your needs. I would not recommend this if u r planning to buy sim free.and one more thing it gets too much heat up and bettery drain too fast.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I would like to give 5/5 to Blackberry as I was a ...
customer_reviews.text: I would like to give 5/5 to Blackberry as I was a big fan of them. But their first Andorid device is not good as I expected after 4 hours using. The workmanship quality on the phone is poor, the left bottom corner on screen is loose when you slide down. Also, there is large empty space inside the phone makes the rear cover like a drum when you touch it. Keyboard is not good comparing to Passport. To be honest, this is not worth £550 I have asked for the refund.
customer_reviews.author: Han Fengze

customer_reviews.title: Samsung phones are much better and the keyboard is too narrow to be of ...
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately it is a big let down. Samsung phones are much better and the keyboard is too narrow to be of any use. Battery life is also too short.
customer_reviews.author: Georgios Fragistas

customer_reviews.title: Iphone better
customer_reviews.text: The phone did not meet my expectations at all. I was hoping this phone will over take the iPhone but it did not. I wish if i could return it back and get an iPhone instead. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Ahmad

customer_reviews.title: Bonus to having a Blackberry Priv
customer_reviews.text: Great phone. Had over two years now and really like it. Bought two actually, one for myself and one for my partner. Dropped one of them and got a stone chip on the screen. A few weeks later the bottom half of the screen disappeared so using the screen keyboard became impossible. Panic would have set in with no ability to type messages, but luckily because it has a physical keyboard I could still type what I needed. Having the physical keyboard has allowed me to continue to use my phone while waiting for a replacement. Well done Blackberry!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Blackberry magic with the keyboard
customer_reviews.text: One of the best mobile phones I've ever had. I have an iPhone 7 and Samsung S6 as well but keep on coming back to the Blackberry for the real keyboard that makes me more productive and allows me to take notes during meetings without looking down on my phone. Blackberry is still the best!
customer_reviews.author: Mr Eco

customer_reviews.title: Best of both.... or at least a good mix.
customer_reviews.text: I love that it still has a great part of the Blackberry prerogatives.... good physical keyboard, a little slow the internet browser, good camera. BB10 was a better operating system no doubt compared to Iphones and Androids.... but the market dictates and this is as close as one can get to a better customer oriented phone, talking phone wise. Wi-Fi calling option was a crucial element in my choice and works really well. The Hub is as the Blackberry strength and all is customised but not as far as in the BB10 which was simply a world apart. Phone quality excellent and battery very good.
customer_reviews.author: FLORENCE RUSSIAN ACADEMY OF ART SRL

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Pros: it’s a good phone for the price Easy to use Good loud speaker Good camera Fairly fast performance for what it is Good for business use Good android system Cons: the phone over heats massively Keeps freezing once it gets warm The screen is loose Cheaply built Annoying curve on the screen ( my opinion) that scracts easy. Could be better but I guess it’s the first shot from blackberry for a while
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Still love BlackBerry!
customer_reviews.text: Great phone. Love having the option of physical keyboard again. Phone comes with Lollipop Android installed and couldn't update to Marshmallow 6 through phone update but this is easily rectified by using Blackberry website uploading tool which is very easy to use. Now running Marshmallow and everything is good! Just waiting for Nougat to arrive! Update 25/02/17- I am returning the phone due to the issues stated by other reviewers. As I said I love the phone but it does get very warm and this can then cause phone to lag. It's a real shame. Love Blackberry so will give the newer handset a try, the DTEK60. Hopefully this will be better.
customer_reviews.author: Sports Fan

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth and happy with my phone
customer_reviews.text: Very powerful piece of kit, it can support very large size memory, I have been using this for a while now not one issue just keeps on going and it hasn’t let me down yet it comes with both conventional and interactive keyboard, very thin but robust design, large screen makes it easier to read if you wear glasses.
customer_reviews.author: PA

customer_reviews.title: Shabby people expected in box not even metal pin
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this paying a few pounds more as I had read it was coming in its orginal box ,NO. It had a plug no box no pin to get into the phone I felt this was sharp practice I should have gone for cheaper deal
customer_reviews.author: anthea 240

customer_reviews.title: Good decent phone
customer_reviews.text: Good decent phone, the front camera is just acceptable, battery life is good, a bit slow on the processing but I moved onto it from note 4 so can't really comment, the charger supplied with the phone was not genuine blackberry and lasted only 1 week
customer_reviews.author: Ahmad

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Blackberry never disappoint. High quality build. Slider function works brilliantly.
customer_reviews.author: QWET SMIT

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So much better than my old BB Classic. Fantastic camera, easy to use, elegant and stylish phone.
customer_reviews.author: CHG3004
